captions.text:
[KRIS] We are now wearing sportswear and readying for shooting
with a concept of exercising.

[CHAN YEOL] We are now facing the release of our first full album
and working hard on preparing for it, so please anticipate for it
And also send us lots of affection as we come back. Thank you!
[KRIS] This is where we will be shooting our music video. Fighting!

[BAEK HYUN] In order to show our fans the new us, 
we will try our best with passion. Fighting.
[CHEN] It's symbolizing the ears of wolf

As we are coming back with the new choreography,
we will show you the cooler EXO.

[CHAN YEOL] As it is the second day of shooting our music video,
I will show you better performance than the first day

And also, we will be coming back with newer and fresher music video
than MAMA for this time. Look forward to it!

[CHAN YEOL] It is called the silhouette filming,
which makes us to appear like a shadow.

title: EXO 엑소_The First Album 'XOXO (Kiss&Hug)' Album Cover & MV Making Film
